issue.title: Add a `Table::refresh()` method that would refetch the rows associated with a Table
Allow `#[LoadFixture]` to be annotated on `beforeEach` to load for every test
Research designs that allow a `#[ControllerActions]` implementation have before and after hooks
Error when attempting to implicitly save a destroyed Session
issue.body: If a controller that has been annotated with `#[RequireSession(SessionAccess:Write)]` destroys the underlying session we should not attempt to call `Session::save()` as the session hasn't been locked yet. An additional check should be made to ensure that we only call `Session::save()` on a locked session.

issue.title: Ensure that URLs with trailing `/` do not result in 404 errors
RFC: Introduce an interface for `Session` (v3 only)
issue.body:
I'd like to gauge the feasibility and willingness to introduce an interface for the `Session` class. There are 2 primary reasons I'd like this functionality:

1. Implementing the decorator pattern. There's functionality I'd like to provide on top of Amp's `Session`. An example of this is a "temporary" storage within the session that gets cleared out after use. I could provide my own interface for this functionality, but then I have to ensure this new API gets used everywhere and nobody uses Amp's Session directly. It would be better if I could decorate Amp's `Session` to provide this functionality and control what implementation gets injected as a dependency.
2. Testing. There are situations where it may be preferable to prove a stub or mock in Controller unit tests. This isn't currently possible.

Thanks for the Amp libraries and considering my idea!
